channel.title: Docker on Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Handbook

item.title: Common Commands
item.description: cp # Copy files/folders between a container and the local filesystem. See also Docker Documentation. docker cp ./some_file CONTAINER:/work docker cp CONTAINER:/var/logs/ /tmp/app_logs Find sha256 # docker inspect --format='{{index .RepoDigests 0}}' $IMAGE See also Where can I find the sha256 code of a docker image?.
